thread.title: Nasdaq sets start dates for Nordic clearing choice
thread.title_full: Nasdaq sets start dates for Nordic clearing choice

author: Financial News
title: Nasdaq sets start dates for Nordic clearing choice
text:
Nasdaq sets start dates for Nordic clearing choice By James Rundle 13 October 2015 Nasdaq is to bring a choice of clearers for traders on its cash equities markets in the Nordic region from November 23 this year, ahead of provisions in regulatory reforms that will make open access between clearers in European markets mandatory.
